snippet.title: Rayman Trailer - 3DS Virtual Console
snippet.description:
Take a look at Rayman's Game Boy Color outing  a much shorter (but still fun) version of the original game.

Head over to IGN for more Rayman:
http://www.ign.com/games/rayman-2-revolution/3ds-98030

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, news, and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
